text: Deenei di mee a Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, ne helekai ai i Edom: “E hai behee? Digau Edom gu de langahia e ginaadou nadau hagamaanadu humalia? Nadau dagi digi hagi anga gi digaula nadau mee ala belee hai? Nadau kabemee la guu odi gi daha?49.7 Isaiah 34.5-17; 63.1-6; Ezekiel 25.12-14; 35.1-15; Amos 1.11-12; Obadiah 1-14; Malachi 1.2-5
